title: 约翰·伍尔曼自传 The Journal of John Woolman
description: 简介： JOHN WOOLMAN was born at Northampton, N. J., in 1720, and died at York,England, in 1772. He Was the child of Quaker parents, and from his youth was azealous member of the Society of Friends. His Journal, published posthumouslyin 1774, suffi...
